page.title: 16Arts and Crafts.
page.content: In our group we did a survey of the craft activities available in our area. We found out which crafts were the most popular in our famlies. We looked at which craft was enjoyed by diffrent age groups and we found that sketching was the most popular and metal work was the least popular with one person doing it .We have found out that there are not many craft shops in our area. Most newsagents sells craft books and magazines weekly and monthly.Here are a few craft magazines and books" Work mate" and "Do it" are both wood work magazines and" Sew it" is a sewing magazine.
